messages: ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (22:33): 139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884: "All browser implementations that I know of already [refuse to process the page] for non-well-formed XHTML" - Konqueror and Links both parse application/xhtml+xml documents with their normal HTML parser, so they happily continue past non-well-formed XHTML (and often parse well-formed XHTML incorrectly)
